sections.general: market consultant - healthcare advocate professional summary ambitious and dedicated managed care professional with robust organizational, communication and customer service skills. multi-disciplinary industry expertise with an emphasis in provider outreach, research\analysis and data integrity. seeking a position to partake in new and innovative improvement processes and proactive provider education efforts. education and training bba : business administration human resources management university of new mexico ï¼​ city , state business administration human resources management skill highlights relationship and team building organizational planning government relations knowledge sound decision makingâ provider education and communication excellent research skills personal and professional integrity claims analysis and review specialist database management project management professional affiliations member of alpha chi omega sorority
